entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Peawanuck
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:11 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -12.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peawanuck Airport 09:19 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -12.0°C
Pressure: 102.1 kPa
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -13.9°C
Wind: NNE 15 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Blizzard. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Blizzard developing this afternoon. Blowing snow this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 50 this morning then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late this afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 11.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
